mapper.insert: insert into BIZ_HAD_REG_DOCTOR (ID, OPEN_ID, APP_CODE, APP_ID, HOSPITAL_ID, HOSPITAL_CODE, HOSPITAL_NAME, BRANCH_HOSPITAL_ID, BRANCH_HOSPITAL_CODE, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, DOCTOR_CODE, DOCTOR_NAME,CREATE_TIME, REG_TYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchHospitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createTime ,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{regType, jdbcType=SMALLINT})

update BIZ_HAD_REG_DOCTOR

APP_CODE = #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
